metadata.name: Suspicious Scheduled Task Update
metadata.comment: Detects update to a scheduled task event that contain suspicious keywords.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM scheduled_job_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('2') AND metadata.event_code = 4702 AND (contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('c:\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('c:\\programdata\\')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('c:\\perflogs\\'))) AND (contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('regsvr32')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe</command>')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('cmd</command>')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('<arguments>/c ')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('<arguments>/k ')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('<arguments>/r ')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('pwsh')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('mshta')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('wscript')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('cscript')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('certutil')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('bitsadmin')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('bash.exe')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('bash ')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('scrcons')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('wmic ')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('wmic.exe')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('forfiles')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('scriptrunner')) OR contains(lower(job.cmd_line), lower('hh.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects update to a scheduled task event that contain suspicious keywords.
